WITH TREE_DATA( GROUP_NUM, MANDT, POST1, ESCS_NUMB, ESCS_NTIM, ESCS_ITSQ, ITEM_DIYN, ESCS_GROP, ESCS_UPGR, ESCS_ITEM, EXTN_ESCS, ESIT_SEQN, ESCE_NAME, MTRL_DIVS, MTRL_NUMB, PART_NAME, STAD, UNIT, QNTY, COST, WAERK, UKURS, ICDT_EPNS, IDRT_COST, SALE_COST, MRGN_RATE, ESMT_COST, NGTT_ESCS, PRES_COST, ESMT_EGRT, CRES_COST, NOTE, ESMT_CMPY, WORD_REFR, OCNT_NUMB, EBDG_MGSQ, EBDG_ITSQ ) AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( PARTITION BY A.ESCS_NUMB, A.ESCS_NTIM ) AS GROUP_NUM ,A.MANDT, A.POST1, A.ESCS_NUMB, A.ESCS_NTIM, A.ESCS_ITSQ, A.ITEM_DIYN, A.ESCS_GROP, A.ESCS_UPGR, A.ESCS_ITEM, A.EXTN_ESCS, A.ESIT_SEQN, A.ESCE_NAME, A.MTRL_DIVS, A.MTRL_NUMB, A.PART_NAME, A.STAD, A.UNIT, A.QNTY, A.COST, A.WAERK, A.UKURS, A.ICDT_EPNS, A.IDRT_COST, A.SALE_COST, A.MRGN_RATE, A.ESMT_COST, A.NGTT_ESCS, A.PRES_COST, A.ESMT_EGRT, A.CRES_COST, A.NOTE, A.ESMT_CMPY, A.WORD_REFR, A.OCNT_NUMB, A.EBDG_MGSQ, A.EBDG_ITSQ FROM TABLE ( SELECT A.POST1 , B.* FROM SAPHEE.ZFST0200 A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZFST0201 B ON (A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.ESCS_NUMB = B.ESCS_NUMB AND A.ESCS_NTIM = B.ESCS_NTIM) WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.ESCS_NUMB = #ESCS_NUMB# AND A.ESCS_NTIM = #ESCS_NTIM#
AND B.ESCS_ITEM LIKE #ESCS_ITEM#||'%'
AND B.ESCS_ITEM IN ( SELECT ESCS_ITEM FROM SAPHEE.ZFST0200 AS X INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZFST0201 AS Y ON X.MANDT = Y.MANDT AND X.ESCS_NUMB = Y.ESCS_NUMB AND X.ESCS_NTIM = Y.ESCS_NTIM WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND Y.ESCS_NUMB = #ESCS_NUMB# AND Y.ESCS_NTIM = #ESCS_NTIM# AND Y.ESMT_COST > 0 AND Y.WORD_REFR LIKE '%'||#WORD_REFR#||'%' GROUP BY ESCS_ITEM ) AND B.ESMT_COST > 0 ORDER BY B.ESCS_NUMB DESC, B.ESCS_NTIM DESC, B.ESIT_SEQN ) AS A UNION ALL SELECT 0 ,'' MANDT, '' POST1, '' ESCS_NUMB,0 ESCS_NTIM,0 ESCS_ITSQ, '' ITEM_DIYN, '' ESCS_GROP, '' ESCS_UPGR, '' ESCS_ITEM, '' EXTN_ESCS, 0 ESIT_SEQN, '' ESCE_NAME, '' MTRL_DIVS, '' MTRL_NUMB, '' PART_NAME, '' STAD, '' UNIT,0 QNTY,0 COST, '' WAERK,0 UKURS,0 ICDT_EPNS,0 IDRT_COST,0 SALE_COST,0 MRGN_RATE,0 ESMT_COST,0 NGTT_ESCS,0 PRES_COST,0 ESMT_EGRT,0 CRES_COST, '' NOTE, '' ESMT_CMPY, '' WORD_REFR, '' OCNT_NUMB,0 EBDG_MGSQ,0 EBDG_ITSQ FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 AS A ), TREE_LEVEL(LEVEL, GROUP_NUM, MANDT, POST1, ESCS_NUMB, ESCS_NTIM, ESCS_ITSQ, ITEM_DIYN, ESCS_GROP, ESCS_UPGR, ESCS_ITEM, EXTN_ESCS, ESIT_SEQN, ESCE_NAME, MTRL_DIVS, MTRL_NUMB, PART_NAME, STAD, UNIT, QNTY, COST, WAERK, UKURS, ICDT_EPNS, IDRT_COST, SALE_COST, MRGN_RATE, ESMT_COST, NGTT_ESCS, PRES_COST, ESMT_EGRT, CRES_COST, NOTE, ESMT_CMPY, WORD_REFR, OCNT_NUMB, EBDG_MGSQ, EBDG_ITSQ ) AS ( SELECT 1, A.* FROM TREE_DATA A WHERE A.MANDT != '' AND (A.GROUP_NUM = 1 OR ESCS_UPGR = '') UNION ALL SELECT B.LEVEL + 1 AS LEVEL ,A.* FROM TREE_DATA A, TREE_LEVEL B WHERE A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.ESCS_NUMB = B.ESCS_NUMB AND A.ESCS_NTIM = B.ESCS_NTIM AND A.ESCS_UPGR = B.ESCS_GROP AND A.MANDT != '' ) SELECT '' AS CHK ,'1' AS FLAG ,A.LEVEL ,A.GROUP_NUM ,A.MANDT -- 클라이언트 ,A.ESCS_NUMB -- 견적원가번호 ,A.ESCS_NTIM -- 견적원가차수 ,A.POST1 -- 프로젝트명 ,A.ESCS_ITSQ -- 견적원가품목순번 ,A.ITEM_DIYN -- 세부품목여부 ,A.ESCS_GROP -- 견적원가그룹 ,A.ESCS_UPGR -- 상위견적원가그룹 ,A.ESCS_GROP||A.ESCS_NUMB||TRIM(CAST(A.ESCS_NTIM AS VARCHAR(3))) AS PESCS_GROP -- 견적원가그룹 ,CASE WHEN A.LEVEL = 1 AND A.ITEM_DIYN = 'M' THEN '' ELSE A.ESCS_UPGR||A.ESCS_NUMB||TRIM(CAST(A.ESCS_NTIM AS VARCHAR(3))) END AS PESCS_UPGR -- 상위견적원가그룹 ,A.ESCS_ITEM -- 견적원가항목 ,A.EXTN_ESCS -- 견적원가항목코드 ,A.ESIT_SEQN -- 견적원가항목순서 ,A.ESCE_NAME -- 견적원가명 ,A.MTRL_DIVS -- 부품원천구분 ,A.MTRL_NUMB -- 자재번/부품번호 ,A.PART_NAME -- 부품명 ,A.STAD -- 규격 ,A.UNIT -- 단위 ,A.QNTY -- 수량 ,A.COST -- 원가 ,A.WAERK -- 통화 키 ,A.UKURS -- 환율 ,A.ICDT_EPNS -- 부대비용 ,A.IDRT_COST -- 간접비 ,A.SALE_COST -- 매출원가 ,A.MRGN_RATE -- 실행율 ,A.ESMT_COST -- 견적원가 ,A.NGTT_ESCS -- 네고견적원가 ,A.PRES_COST -- 이전견적금액 ,A.ESMT_EGRT -- 견적환율 ,A.CRES_COST -- 통화견적원가 ,A.NOTE -- 비고 ,A.ESMT_CMPY -- 견적업체명 ,A.WORD_REFR -- 단어참조 ,A.OCNT_NUMB -- 수주번호 ,A.EBDG_MGSQ -- 시행예산관리순번 ,A.EBDG_ITSQ -- 시행예산품목순번 FROM TREE_LEVEL A ORDER BY A.ESCS_NUMB DESC, A.ESCS_NTIM DESC, A.ESIT_SEQN FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
